metadata.title: CVE-2022-3715 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
A flaw was found in the bash package, where a heap-buffer overflow canoccur in valid parameter_transform. This issue may lead to memory problems.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-3715` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

bash - 5.2-1ubuntu2
bash-builtins - 5.2-1ubuntu2
bash-static - 5.2-1ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: bash package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.2-1ubuntu2').
